name: Dropert (itch)
description:
How many fruits can you get?

Enjoy the thrill of dodging droplets as you collect fruits and coins on an expanding game board.

Poems

Unwind by reading some cheesy-goofy poetry between sessions.

Characters

Use the coins you collect to unlock more peculiar characters.

________________________________________________________________________

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD to move. ESC or P to pause. That's it!

You can listen to the soundtrack on SoundCloud.

If you want to put the game in your pocket, it's also available on iOS!
